status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h4. Problem Description
Customer/Community needs support for Python 3.0 (Ubuntu will be using it by default in 13.04). 

h4. More info
Currently, the logs when using Python 3.0:

{code}
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1
  File "/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.0.2.GA/android/builder.py", line 117
    print "[DEBUG] Signal %s received. Terminating the logcat process." % signum
                                                                      ^
SyntaxError: invalid syntax
{code}

comments.body: We're moving away from Python. It was fun while it lasted.
